name: 106's Pocket Dimension (recycled/reimagined)
description:
this is 106's Pocket Dimension, but with the old assets recycled to into a much better looking product, this was made for the Recycle Jam 2021, I had a lot of fun looking at the old assets and revamping them

WARNING: this is a horror game, and has scary moments

just incase you struggle finding out how to move, its typical asdw to move, and shift to run 

original: 106's pocket dimension by ICONICWARE (itch.io)
